mapper.select: select order_status from banxing_order where id = #{orderCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select tutor_id from banxing_order where id = #{orderCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select order_status as status, version as version from banxing_order where id = #{orderCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select total_cost from banxing_order where id = #{orderCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select o.id as orderCode, o.reserve_date as reserveDate, o.reserve_start_time as reserveStartTime, o.reserve_end_time as reserveEndTime, o.consultation_content as consultationContent, o.resume_url as resumeUrl, o.reject_reason as rejectReason, o.conference_link as conferenceLink, u.nick_name as userName from banxing_order o left join banxing_user u on o.user_id = u.id where o.id = #{orderCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and o.tutor_id = #{tutorId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
